results.definition: a container used for carrying money and small personal items or accessories (especially by women)
examples: she reached into her bag and found a comb

results.definition: a sum of money spoken of as the contents of a money purse
examples: he made the contribution out of his own purse
he and his wife shared a common purse

results.definition: a small bag for carrying money
a sum of money offered as a prize
examples: the purse barely covered the winner's expenses

results.definition: contract one's lips into a rounded shape
gather or contract into wrinkles or folds; pucker
